New Records: Rilee Rossouw became the second player to score back-to-back centuries in T20I matches after his century against Bangladesh.
Rossouw scored 109 runs from 56 balls, the highest score of the match.
Key Match Events: Rossouw's century was a turning point in the match as South Africa recovered from an early loss to post a strong total.
The partnership between Rossouw and Quinton de Kock (163 runs) was the highest in T20 World Cup history.
Post-Match Reflections: Quinton de Kock praised Rossouw's performance, calling it a 'treat to watch' and expressing happiness about his return to the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant as it marked Rossouw's second consecutive century in T20I cricket.
